TEXT.S: = Malaloong = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Fungpinsyang ka alang Malaloong. 137 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 342 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 91% niqan 310 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 9% niqan 32 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis68%, Paiwan1%, Rukai1%, Kebalan18%, ni rahuq na o4%.
